sub_title: Senior Lecturer, Research Coach, Clinical Music Therapist MA, Editor
summary:
Experienced senior lecturer and research coach in higher education for bachelor, pre-master and master programmes in music therapy, music and music education. 

Highly skilled professional at master level with a demonstrated history of working in higher education as advisor, curriculum development, programme leader, supervisor and lecturer. 

Mental health specialist and experienced clinical music therapist at MA level in the field of mental health care with a specialisation in mood disorders.
Specialised in targeted receptive music therapy programmes, evidence based protocols for mood disorders and online interventions with music listening for affect regulation, stress reduction and recovery.

Skilled in music education (BA), classical piano and music therapy research (MA)

profile_positions.company: Codarts Rotterdam | University of the Arts
profile_positions.description:
Faculty Member Master of Arts Therapies.
Teaching Music Therapy Theory & Methods, with a focus on Receptive Music Therapy, music listening and its clinical application in (mental) health care. 
Coaching final year students in their graduate research, examinator, assessment of theses.
Co-teacher for the Elective (minor) on "Music Listening: Perspectives from neuromusicology, music psychology, theory and applications" for the Master of Music.
profile_positions.title: Senior Lecturer | Research coach |Tutor| Master Music Therapy | Master of Music

profile_positions.company: Codarts Rotterdam | University of the Arts
profile_positions.description:
Curriculum design: Advisor and Project Coordinator for the development, design and implementation of the 3-years part-time International Master Music Therapy, Faculty Master of Arts Therapies. Development of the curriculum, assembling teaching staff and admissions committee. With an international teaching staff the master programme was developed by a special attracted MT team and in close collaboration with Codarts' Faculty Master Dance Therapy and the Music Therapy Department of the Anglia Ruskin University, Cambridge, UK. 

http://www.codarts.nl/programmes/music/master-music-therapy/
profile_positions.title: Programme Coordinator Master Music Therapy  | Lecturer |Member Research Committee| Tutor

profile_positions.description: Teaching receptive music therapy methodology for 2nd & 3rd year students, mentor internship for pre-master students, coaching final year students in their graduate research, examinator, assessment of theses.
profile_positions.title: Visiting Lecturer Receptive Music Therapy & Research Coach

profile_positions.description:
Experienced Clinical Music Therapist at MA level with a demonstrated history of working in mental health care. Skilled in individual and group therapy, team building and music psychotherapy. 

Clinical music therapist for inpatients at the Depression Clinic PsyQ Haaglanden with a specialisation in evidence-based receptive music therapy interventions for major depression; 
Online musictherapy interventions for affect regulation and recovery. 
Expert Circle for the development of modules on emotion regulation and stress regulation with Music Therapy and Art Therapy for the HOME teams for I-Psy / PsyQ /Brijder Amsterdam North-Holland

Broad experience as music therapist, active and receptive music therapy with various populations in mental healthcare, as mood disorders, personality disorders, forensic psychiatry, crisisinterventions, multidisciplinairy psychotherapeutic programme PsyQ Ambulant. 

Co-therapist in the 3-day part-time treatment programme for chronic depression as cognitive therapy, emotion regulation, day-structuring training, psycho-education and prevention.

Expertise in receptive music therapy, mood disorders, music listening interventions and protocols. Within a cognitive informed approach the RMT interventions address affect modulation , mood and emotionregulation.
profile_positions.title: Clinical Music Therapist MA (MMTh) NMT-M, senior registered SRMTh

profile_positions.description:
Adviseur voor het ontwikkelen van een zorgaanbod vaktherapie voor de HOME teams bij I-Psy PsyQ Brijder Amsterdam. 
Expert circle met Martine van Arkel (BT) en Jellien Huigen (MT). Modules muziek en beeldende therapie emotieregulatie en spanningsregulatie
profile_positions.title: Adviseur en ontwikkelaar zorgaanbod HOME teams I-Psy PsyQ Brijder Amsterdam

profile_positions.description: Development of Online webinars & training courses on Music Listening in clinical Receptive Music Therapy with Clare Macfarlane
